title: STAPLES Tru Red Pen Permanent Markers Ultra Fine Tip Blk 36/Pack
features: Marks most surfaces easily and resists fading.
Bold Blk color makes your signs or notes easy to read at a distance.
Ultra fine precision tip for smooth, clean writing.
Low odor formula ideal for classrooms, office, or home.
description: Create smooth, bold lines on a variety of surfaces with this 36-pack of TRU REDTM ultra fine tip Blk permanent markers. Give handwriting a clean, precise look with these ultra-fine-tip markers. The permanent ink resists fading, while the Blk color stands out on the page for better visibility. Each of these TRU REDTM ultra-fine-tip Blk permanent markers features a square barrel for a more comfortable grip as you fill out lengthy forms or record notes during meetings.
